hypothesis_content.title: BTC Liquidity Compression Breakout Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC consolidates within a 3% range for 5 consecutive days during NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the range high on increasing volume (>20% above 20-day average) signals momentum acceleration toward next resistance level.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended compression during neutral periods represents accumulation; breakout on volume confirms institutional participation. Crypto markets exhibit strong momentum following prolonged consolidation.
entry_conditions: BTC daily close within ±3% of opening price for 5 consecutive days
BTC breaks above 5-day range high with volume >20% above 20-day average
No major resistance within 2% of breakout level

exit_conditions.take_profit: 8% gain from entry or next major resistance level (whichever comes first)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: 3% below breakout level or range low

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain above range high for 2 consecutive closes, or volume declines below average within 48 hours of breakout.
